## Checklist

Please ensure your PR meets these requirements:

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project (Rubocop passes)
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] All RSpec tests pass (`bundle exec rspec`)
- [ ] Test coverage remains at or above current levels

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the README.md if needed
- [ ] I have added/updated YARD documentation for public methods
- [ ] I have updated CONTRIBUTING.md if development workflow changed
- [ ] I have added usage examples for new features

### Changelog

- [ ] I have updated CHANGELOG.md under the `[Unreleased]` section
- [ ] My changelog entry follows the format: `- [Component] Description (#PR_NUMBER)`

### Dependencies

- [ ] I have not added new dependencies (or have justified why they are necessary)
- [ ] All dependencies are compatible with the required Ruby and Rails versions
